features: 【Package Includes】: You will receive 6 sets writing stationery paper in different styles , 4 sheets letter paper and 2 sheets envelopes per set. There are 24 sheets writing paper and 12 envelopes in total. Letter paper size: 7*5.2 inches, envelope size: 5.6*3.6 inches.
【Aesthetic Design】: Stationery paper and envelopes set adopts vintage romantic floral theme design, soft tone, giving a fresh, elegant feeling.
【Individually Wrapped for Each Style】: Each style of stationery comes in individual packaging, making them very clean and organized, and easy to divide into small gifts.

【High Quality Materials】: Our envelope stationery paper is very thick and strong, smooth surface, smooth writing, impermeable. The cute envelopes come in different colors and patterns that are very pretty, you can mix and match as much as you like to make some cute personalized letters!

【Thoughtful Gifts】: These beautiful floral stationery envelopes are great for daily writing and as gifts for friends, but also for business invitations, party invitations, well wishes, greeting notes, thank you notes, cards, love letters, poems, etc. Stationary set is perfect for Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, anniversaries, birthdays, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A beautiful romantic vintage flower style stationery set Reasons for choosing us: 1.Super cute stationary with several different designs 2.Each pattern is cute and each design is individually pre-packaged in its own plastic bag 3.Like the colors of spring 4.The front of the letter paper printed lines, convenient for you to write neatly; The back is blank, allowing you to give full play to your creativity Use our stationery set to write a warm word， a heartwarming greeting, and a sincere wish to a friend or family member, to enhance mutual relationship.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These sheets and envelopes have beautiful designs… the floral print is delicate and lovely. The shipping was fast and efficient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like these and the paper is good even with my fountain pens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stationary comes in several different patterns along with matching envelopes. The designs are cute and petite. I love the paper size and the fact that they are lined! The downsize is that each design only has a few pieces of paper and two envelopes. But overall, a cute set for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Cute, Quality Writing Paper And Envelopes!
reviews.reviewText: I needed some pretty stationery, as I often write letters to family and friends. I guess since so many people correspond through emails now, nice stationery has been hard to find. I love the personal touch of handwritten correspondence, so I ordered this stationery set on Amazon. I am very glad that I did!I received 6 sets of individually wrapped writing paper/envelopes in really pretty, soft styles and patterns of flowers, birds and plants. The stationery/envelopes are of strong quality, and the front of the stationery is lined, while the back has the soft, lovely pattern printed on it. The envelopes match the pattern printed on the writing paper.This stationery is a wonderful value, and is perfect for letter writers like myself. The patterns can be mixed or matched, and the recipients will just love them. I highly recommend this great stationery set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute matching set
reviews.reviewText: Is old-fashioned letter writing making a comeback? I certainly hope so! I write letters every week to my sister-in-law, and I love this matching set of paper and envelopes. The edges are scalloped and the border of the pages have a matching color to the envelopes. Each set is individually wrapped, so they won't get scattered, bent, or misplaced - a very handy detail to the packaging.This is a great set for girly girls who want to start letter writing again, or for those who already do and are looking to spruce up their stationary. Takes the ink well and adds great enjoyment to my weekly letter writing.
I was looking everywhere for stationery and couldn’t find it!
